oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Transient reconfigurable subangstrom-precise photonic circuits at the optical fiber surface
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dmitriev, A.
Toropov, N.
Sumetsky, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - Optics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Transient fully reconfigurable photonic circuits can be introduced at the optical fiber surface with subangstrom precision. A building block of these circuits, a 0.7 angstrom-precise nano-bottle resonator, is experimentally created by local heating, translated, and annihilated.
Comment: 3 pages, 2 figures, 28th Annual Conference of the IEEE Photonics Society (Reston, 2015), postdeadline paper PD2
